attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call a general election before Article 50 is invoked
attributes.additional_details: With the break up of the Union at stake and no obvious plan in place this requires a new government.
attributes.background: The process of leaving the EU cannot formally be before Article 50 is invoked. The current divided government has a Prime Minister who has already resigned and a mandate based on a bare majority of the EU referendum vote. Parliament should be dissolved by HM The Queen and new government elected.
